article.data-sblg-tags: easy beginners recipeforbeginners proteinbar review product amazon bodybuilding store cookieroll labrada icedbrownie cinnamonbun kanelbulle cinnamon bar

header.aside: Easiest 2-ingredient protein-bar recipe in the world! Nothing but grahams and a Cookie Roll protein bar to make a delicious kanelbulle cinnamon bun protein barwich.

section.p: I actually made a kanelbulle smörgås (cinnamon bun sandwich) out of nothing but a protein bar and crackers. I called it my Cookieroll Cinnabon Barwich, and it was so delicious I could hardly believe how simple it was. This is by far the easiest Lila, Chop! recipe for beginners. All it takes is 2 ingredients to make a delicious, high-protein, and filling sandwich that tastes just like a pastry, and the only kitchen appliance you need is a microwave!

figure.figcaption: A kanelbulle smörgås – cinnamon bun protein sandwich

tr.td: Labrada Cookie Roll Cinnamon Bun protein bar, or
any flavoured Cookie Roll protein bar or Questnutrition questbar

img.alt: Labrada Cookie Roll Cinnamon Bun protein bar

section.p: When I came across Labrada Cookie Roll protein bars, I could not believe the reviews. The way customers raved about the taste made it sound like a candy bar. Naturally, I decided to order a couple myself to see if they really were all that. The answer was both yes and no – no, if you eat them just out of the wrapper, as they leave a chalky taste and dry-mouth feeling like most whey protein bars. On the other hand, hell yes! if you follow the tip on the wrapper and microwave them for a few seconds (just like with Questbars). It's amazing how heating up something can make such a difference to consistency, chewability, and taste. This one tasted just like a kanelbulle cinnamon bun pastry when heated and sandwiched between two crunchy graham crackers. Try it yourself!

img.alt: Cinnamon Bun protein barwich on a plate.

section.p: As you can see, it was simple too good to wait until the after photo was taken to have my first bite.

tr.td: Remove Cookie Roll bar from wrapper.
Microwave Cookie Roll on heat setting (careful not to overheat!).
Place warm Cookie Roll bar on 1 graham cracker.
Using a knife, cut Cookie Roll bar whilst it's still warm and spread on graham cracker
Place other graham cracker on top and gently press together.

section.h3: An even simpler Cookie Roll recipe:
section.p:
Got no graham crackers? Don't like graham crackers? No problem! An even simpler and easier Cookie Roll protein bar recipe is to just heat one up in the microwave and eat it like that. This works with any flavoured Cookie Roll protein bar. The
Iced Brownie Cookie Roll tastes just like a regular brownie when heated and dunked into coffee (see photo below).

img.alt: Labrada iced brownie protein bar and coffee

figure.figcaption: Espresso & a warm Iced Brownie Cookie Roll protein bar.
